Episodes.Title: The War Over Gender
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Mack Beggs, Ted Cruz
Episodes.Plot: It's a boy. It's a girl. It's a spectrum. It's nineteen possible chromosomal combinations. Look, it's complicated.

Episodes.Title: Where Is Our Tax Money Going?
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Ameshia Cross, Ted Cruz
Episodes.Plot: Sure, people hate taxes. But they wouldn't if they knew where the money went, right? Well, Jon finds out and he hates it even more.

Episodes.Title: Globalization: Made in America
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, LeVar Burton, Roy Cooper
Episodes.Plot: America's leaders know what's plaguing the country: Globalization. Thankfully, they have a plan -- Globalization of their own, American Style.

Episodes.Title: Midterms: This Is What Democracy Looks Like?
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Gloria Borger, Mark Brnovich
Episodes.Plot: The most important U.S. midterm elections of all time are here again. But the game has changed.

Episodes.Title: Allies: Friends Without Benefits
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, James A. Baker, Joe Biden
Episodes.Plot: When America needs help from its allies, it makes promises. But when those allies ask for help, America breaks those promises.

Episodes.Title: Election Wrap-Up special
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Rob Christensen
Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, LeVar Burton, Ted Cruz
Episodes.Plot: Who won? Who lost? Is the U.S. still a democracy? All we know is that everyone is happy and no one is questioning the results.

Episodes.Title: Chaos, Law, and Order
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Alexa Loftus
Episodes.Actors: Maria Bartiromo, John Berman, Lauren Boebert
Episodes.Plot: Can you be tough on crime but soft on guns? The numbers say no, but too many legislators say yes. In "Chaos, Law, and Order," Jon looks at how weakening gun laws is making everyone - including law enforcement - less safe.

Episodes.Title: The Military Industrial Excess
Episodes.Writer: Kristen Acimovic, Henrik Blix, Alexa Loftus
Episodes.Actors: Michael Bennet, Marsha Blackburn, Bill Cassidy

Episodes.Title: The Inflation Blame Game

Episodes.Actors: Jon Stewart, Lindsay Owens, Kenneth Rogoff
